title: Senior Product Manager, Search Platforms
description: At Google, we put our users first. The world is always changing, so we need Product Managers who are continuously adapting and excited to work on products that affect millions of people every day.
key_qualifications: 9 years of experience in product management within consumer products or SaaS developer platforms. Experience creating product roadmaps from conception to launch, driving the product vision, defining go-to-market strategy, and leading design discussions.
preferred_qualifications: Experience as a Technical Product Manager working with Engineers. Experience in navigating through product and technology trade-offs, building the platform, while iterating on the product. Experience in leading platform changes at scale, while understanding the end user habits. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
responsibilities: Design, build, and advance framework, processes, metrics, and tools to track platform improvements as well as articulating accountability across product/feature teams and executive leadership. Communicate with different cross-teams as well as with leadership on platform as well as Search. Develop and lead Fundamentals Service Level Objectives (SLOs) to improve Search product. Develop the business value for Search Platform investments such as new capabilities for Search or fundamental platform improvements. Collaborate within the existing Search Platform teams as well as build deep partnership and momentum for platform offerings with the Search teams. Understand the technology and propose long-term platform offerings that allow Search to build for the future.
